mapper.select: SELECT mal.surface_plot AS surfacePlot, mal.activity_name AS activityName, mal.active_status AS activeStatus, mal.id FROM marketing_activity_list mal WHERE mal.del_flag = '0' AND mal.`status` = '1' AND NOW()<= mal.end_time ORDER BY sort

SELECT mal.surface_plot AS surfacePlot, mal.activity_name AS activityName, mal.active_status AS activeStatus, mal.id, mal.content, mal.posters, mal.cover_plan AS coverPlan, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM marketing_activity_list_record WHERE member_list_id = #{paramMap.memberListId} AND marketing_activity_list_id = mal.id ) AS recordCount, DATE_FORMAT( mal.registration_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS registrationTime, DATE_FORMAT( mal.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT( mal.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS endTime, mal.places, mal.detailed_address AS detailedAddress, mal.phone FROM marketing_activity_list mal WHERE mal.id = #{paramMap.id}
